text: Derek Jameson (November 29, 1929 - September 12, 2012) was a British journalist, DJ, and broadcaster for several British newspapers. He is also known for his works in the Daily Express, the Daily Star, and for the News of the World. He was born in London, England. He was married three times and had four children.Telegraph obituary He died on September 12, 2012 in London, England from a heart attack, aged 82.BBC News: Veteran broadcaster Derek Jameson dies, aged 82 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:English journalists Category:Radio personalities from London Category:Writers from London
title: Derek Jameson
